paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a genetic variant in the TTR gene associated with familial transthyretin amyloidosis.

patients.phenotype: familial transthyretin amyloidosis with autonomic neuropathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with familial transthyretin amyloidosis, developed autonomic neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: He was diagnosed with familial transthyretin (TTR) amyloidosis 8 years earlier when he developed autonomic neuropathy leading to a fat pad biopsy, which was positive.

functional_data.summary: The variant is known to cause polyneuropathy and cardiac amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with familial amyloidosis.
variants.additional_notes: No additional functional assays or population frequency data were provided.
key_quotes: He was diagnosed with familial transthyretin (TTR) amyloidosis 8 years earlier when he developed autonomic neuropathy leading to a fat pad biopsy, which was positive.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
